title: Land for sale in Ampitiya
details:
500 Perch land,
4 Km to Kandy town, 3 km to Ampitiya Road
15 feet wide road access to land
Ideal to be used for any cultivation purpose, Also, can be developed as a Agricultural estate (or any other agricultural purpose), & residential purposes (can be divided plots for sale) or Hotel & tourism
Price Rs 700,000/- per perch (negotiable)
Inspection by appointment.

Please call for more information
Pan Global Property Developers (Pvt) Ltd
